item.title: 30 Day Typing Challenge
item.description: I have a confession to make. I’m a professional software developer and have been for many years, and have spent much of my life in front of a keyboard. But my typing absolutely sucks. From a distance it sort of looks like I touch type. My hands certainly move fast enough. But instead of my fingers remaining nicely glued to the home row, where they belong, my left hand will unexpectedly dart over to the right side of the keyboard.

item.title: First!
